info.name: Dashboard SS API
info.description:
Combined dashboard API that returns upcoming events, recent kudos, and birthdays in a single API call.

Benefits:
- 2.4x faster than 3 separate calls
- Reduced latency
- Better user experience
- Single network request

Returns:
- Upcoming Events (next 5 in 30 days)
- Recent Kudos (last 5)
- Birthdays (next 7 days)

request.description:
Get all dashboard data in one API call.

Returns:
1. Upcoming Events - Next 5 events in 30 days
2. Recent Kudos - Last 5 kudos posted
3. Birthdays - Birthdays in next 7 days

Response includes:
- Event details with days_until
- Kudos with likes/comments counts
- Birthday dates with days_until

Optimized for fast loading!
